title: (x) We Tear Your - (similar to) Merseybeat {Ignacio}
content:
Did someone say free knockoff? Here are three I found that are close:   
 [Acens](http://web.archive.org/web/20051110022116/http:/www.dafont.com/en/theme.php?cat=401&page=1)   
 ![acens sample](http://web.archive.org/web/20051110022116im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/22537.jpg)   
   
 [Green Mountain](http://web.archive.org/web/20051110022116/http:/www.abstractfonts.com/fonts/search/full_listing.htm?kw=green%2Bmountain)   
 ![grmtn sample](http://web.archive.org/web/20051110022116im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/22538.jpg)   
   
 [Federation Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20051110022116/http:/star-trek-fonts.fanspace.com/)   
 ![fed sample](http://web.archive.org/web/20051110022116im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/22539.jpg)
author: lisa_p

comments.content: Yves, take most people in the world and ask them if they give a rats posterior weither an all cap head line matches something that was done even a week ago as long as it says discount or free. I think for this purpose horse shoes and hand grenades are close enough for Stephen.
Stephen did you venture over to DaFonts they have a large collection of font faximillies

If you "correct" the slant of [Merseybeat](http://web.archive.org/web/20051110022116/http:/www.girlswhowearglasses.com/mersey.html) (dincTYPE), make it 120% wider and add a thin line to look a little bolder, you get this:   
   
 ![mersey](http://web.archive.org/web/20051110022116im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/23009.gif)   
   
Do you think it could be possible?
